about_the_game:
Echo of Souls is an Action Adventure Platformer in a post apocalypse settings. Switch between 2 characters with distinct abilities to slay your enemies and go through obstacles on your path of revenge.

Features

Echo of Souls features a character-swapping mechanic that lets players switch between two distinct play styles seamlessly. The first character excels in physical combat and brute strength, perfect for taking down enemies head-on.

The second character introduces new elements to the game, range attacks and environmental manipulation to overcome obstacles and outsmart opponents.

This dynamic system adds depth to gameplay, encouraging players to adapt their strategies to different challenges, whether in combat, exploration, or puzzle-solving.

Story

After a devastating apocalypse, a family of three found peace living in the secluded woods. One fateful day, while the father was chopping wood, their lives were torn apart. He returned to find his wife killed and his daughter kidnapped. With her dying breath, the wife pleaded for him to save their child. Following the trail, the father discovers that his daughter was sold to a sinister corporation conducting experiments on humans. His search leads him to an abandoned laboratory, where he encounters a frozen woman trapped in a chamber. Attempting to free her triggers an accident, merging her soul with his body. Now bound together, these two souls must navigate a treacherous world, driven by revenge and the hope of reuniting with the daughter.
